title: Gorakhpur to Nepal Highlights Tour
description: Experience the best of Nepal in 4 days — from Lumbini’s sacred peace to Pokhara’s lakes and Chitwan’s jungle adventures. A perfect getaway from Gorakhpur for families, couples, and explorers.

itinerary.title: Gorakhpur → Lumbini → Pokhara
activities: Meet & Greet at Gorakhpur Airport / Railway Station (around 8:00 AM)
Proceed to Sonauli Border for immigration formalities
Visit Lumbini – Birthplace of Lord Buddha (UNESCO Site)
Drive to Pokhara and check in at your hotel
Evening leisure time near Fewa Lake
Overnight stay in Pokhara

itinerary.title: Pokhara Local Sightseeing
activities: Early visit to Pumdikot Sunrise Point for Himalayan views
Explore Pokhara attractions: Bindhyabasini Temple, Mahendra & Bat Caves, Seti River Gorge
Visit International Mountain Museum, Devi’s Fall & Gupteshwor Mahadev Cave
Enjoy optional boating at Fewa Lake and visit Tal Barahi Temple
Overnight stay in Pokhara

itinerary.title: Pokhara → Chitwan
activities: After breakfast, depart for Chitwan
Check in at the resort and relax
Evening visit to Rapti River Sunset Point
Tharu Cultural Dance Show at local theatre
Overnight stay in Chitwan

itinerary.title: Chitwan Safari → Gorakhpur Return
activities: Early morning Jungle Safari in Chitwan National Park
Optional: Canoeing on Rapti River or Elephant Safari
Breakfast at resort and check out by 12:00 PM
Drive back to Gorakhpur for Airport / Railway Station drop

inclusions: Accommodation in well-rated hotels and resorts
All sightseeing and transfers by private vehicle
Tharu Cultural Dance Show in Chitwan
Jungle Safari in Chitwan National Park
exclusions: Adventure activities like Paragliding or Zip flyer
Entry fees not mentioned in inclusions

seo.meta_title: Gorakhpur to Nepal Tour – Lumbini Pokhara Chitwan 4 Days Package by Yatra Holiday
seo.meta_description: Book a 4-day Nepal tour from Gorakhpur with Yatra Holiday. Visit Lumbini, Pokhara & Chitwan — explore lakes, Buddha’s birthplace, and thrilling jungle safaris.
